dataset.name: provenance
dataset.description: Version incremented from 0.8 (Provenance) to 1.1 (Provenance) in January 2023 following internal review and updates, and to match the versioning on the PRSB website.

concept.name: event_record
concept.description: This is a record of an event performed by someone or something. An event can happen at one time and be recorded at another time.

concept.name: author
concept.description: The person, professional or device recording the information in the record.

concept.name: person
concept.description: The person recording the information in the record.

concept.name: name
concept.description: The name of the person completing the record.

concept.name: relationship
concept.description: The relationship the personal contact has to the person, e.g. father, grandmother, family friend etc. Includes additional roles the person performs on behalf of the other (e.g. carer, next of kin, emergency contact, dependent, etc.).

concept.name: coded_value
concept.description: The coded value for relationship.
concept.valueSets: Nationally or internationally maintained code system(s) (see implementation guidance).

concept.name: free_text
concept.description: Free text field to be used if no code is available.

concept.name: professional
concept.description: The professional recording the information in the record.

concept.name: name
concept.description: The name of the professional.<br clear="none"/>

concept.name: role
concept.description: The role the professional has in relation to the person e.g. GP, physiotherapist, community nurse, social worker etc.

concept.name: coded_value
concept.description: The coded value for role.
concept.valueSets: Nationally or internationally maintained code system(s). E.g. HL7 FHIR Practitioner/Role; SNOMED; National workforce dataset; NHS Occupation codes. See implementation guidance.

concept.name: free_text
concept.description: Free text field to be used if no code is available.

concept.name: grade
concept.description: The grade of the professional.

concept.name: specialty
concept.description: The specialty of the professional e.g. physiotherapy, oncology, mental health, etc.

concept.name: coded_value
concept.description: The coded value for specialty.
concept.valueSets: Nationally or internationally mandated code system(s) (see implementation guidance).

concept.name: free_text
concept.description: Free text field to be used if no code is available.

concept.name: professional_identifier_type
concept.description: The type of professional identifier. For example, General Medical Council (GMC); Nursing and Midwifery Council (NMC) numbers.
concept.valueSets: Nationally or internationally maintained code system(s) (see implementation guidance).

concept.name: professional_identifier
concept.description: Professional identifier for the professional completing the record e.g. General Medical Council (GMC), Nursing Medical Council (NMC) number etc, or the personal identifier used by the local organisation.

concept.name: organisation
concept.description: The name of the organisation the professional works for.

concept.name: coded_value
concept.description: The coded value for organisation.
concept.valueSets: Nationally or internationally maintained code list(s) (see implementation guidance).

concept.name: free_text
concept.description: Free text field to be used if no code is available

concept.name: device
concept.description: The device recording the information in the record.

concept.name: device_type
concept.description: The device type.

concept.name: coded_value
concept.description: The coded value for device type.
concept.valueSets: Nationally or internationally maintained code system(s) (see implementation guidance).

concept.name: free_text
concept.description: Free text field to be used if no code is available.

concept.name: device_manufacturer
concept.description: Name of the device manufacturer.

concept.name: coded_value
concept.description: The coded value for device manufacturer.
concept.valueSets: Nationally or internationally maintained code system(s) (see implementation guidance).

concept.name: free_text
concept.description: Free text field to be used if no code is available

concept.name: model
concept.description: The model of the device.

concept.name: coded_value
concept.description: The coded value for model.
concept.valueSets: Nationally or internationally maintained code system(s) (see implementation guidance)

concept.name: free_text
concept.description: Free text field to be used if no code is available

concept.name: software_version
concept.description: The version of software running on the device.

concept.name: unique_identifier
concept.description: The unique identifier for the device.

concept.name: performer
concept.description: The person, professional or device performing the activity in the record.

concept.description: The person performing the activity in the record.

concept.description: The name of the person completing the record.

concept.name: device

concept.name: coded_value
concept.description: The coded value for device type.
concept.valueSets: Nationally or internationally maintained code system(s) (see implementation guidance).

concept.description: Name of the device manufacturer.

concept.name: coded_value
concept.description: The coded value for device manufacturer.
concept.valueSets: Nationally or internationally maintained code system(s) (see implementation guidance).

concept.name: software_version

concept.name: activity_location
concept.description: The location where the activity was performed.

concept.name: activity_location_type
concept.description: The type of location where the activity took place.
concept.valueSets: Nationally or internationally maintained code system(s) (see implementation guidance).

concept.name: activity_location
concept.description: The location where the activity took place.

concept.name: coded_value
concept.description: The coded value for activity location.
concept.valueSets: Nationally or internationally maintained code system(s) (see implementation guidance).

concept.name: event_date
concept.description: Date of the event.

concept.name: date_recorded
concept.description: Date the event was recorded.

concept.name: record
concept.description: A set of data items that are recorded together that have the same date, author and context.
